page.title: 09 BLACK PARK
page.content:
When I went to Black Park I took my football and my toy electric boat to run in the lake.When we got to the lake we put the battery into the boat,moved the rudder and off it went.The problem was that it stopped in the middle of the lake,so we had to ask a person to turn it back for me.Later we put the rudder to the far left so it would go around in circles and it would come back.This time some water got into the engine,so then we went into a field,which had some trees which I could climb.I went from tree to tree 3 times.Soon we had to go because our dinner was be ready.
ANTHONY MONGER AGED 11
